name: Dataspin Analytics SDK for Unity3D
tagline: Dataspin is an all-in-one back-end solution to manage your game and help you earn more.
body:
## Welcome to Dataspin Analytics SDK for Unity3D page

Dataspin is an all-in-one back-end solution to manage your game and help you earn more. Tailored for gaming. Lets you communicate with your players better, reward the whales, incentivize, engage, retain. Segment, target them with campaigns, offer items and promos. Manage your store efficiently.

### Easy Unity3D integration
Simply import `.unitypackage`, drop prefab into scene and fire following functions.
```
Dataspin.Instance.RegisterUser("John", "Dataspin", "john@Dataspin.io");
Dataspin.Instance.RegisterDevice(<notification_id>);
Dataspin.Instance.StartSession();
```

### End-to-end solution
Analytics. Player segmentation. Campaigns. Predictive analytics. All revenue sources. Player profiles. IAPs. Now all in one place.

### Actionable Analytics
Reports, key metrics and predictions. And the tools to put them to work.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with SDK? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/Dataspin/Dataspin_2.0-Unity-Plugin/wiki or contact rafal@dataspin.io and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

### Cutting-Edge Tech
Industry-grade back-end. Based on the superfast and powerful SAP HANA, used by Coca-Cola or Samsung among others.
